body:
i'm thankful that i take out the trash and that d brings in the empty bins after the garbage truck comes. i'm thankful that when she was doing this yesterday after her run, a man was walking down the street with a shiba inu, her favorite dog of all dogs (and probably the same one that i saw on sunday on my run and told you about then). i'm thankful that she asked the man walking the dog where he got it, since shibas are very rare in our town, and he said that he was dog sitting and didn't know. i'm thankful that though she didn't pet the shiba because she felt gross from her run and because of touching the garbage bins, she at least got to see him (and might get to see him or touch him again—i'm thankful that her office is in the front of the house with a big window overlooking the street).  i'm thankful to have that as a reminder that sometimes when doing a chore as prosaic as bringing in the empty garbage bins (or whatever the equivalent is for you, in your day), a nice thing like seeing your favorite dog of all dogs can happen by surprise.

i'm thankful for _the leftovers_, which has gone full _lost_ in its final season and which i love for that. i'm thankful for the swiss scientists. i'm thankful for the schema of _lost_\-_leftovers_ characters i thought about yesterday:

kevin = jack 

laurie = kate

nora = juliet

the jamisons = locke (matt bc of his craziness, mary bc of the wheelchair)

tom = sawyer (LOL IT'S ALL CONNECTED)

meg = ben

patti = man in black

the grandfather = jacob

evie = walt

i'm thankful that e discovered that the band that did a horn ensemble cover of "take on me" in the most recent episode is called genghis barbie. i'm thankful for their album on spotify, which is quite soothing and pleasant background music—i'm thankful in particular for their soft slow warm cover of "[can't take my eyes off of you](https://open.spotify.com/track/6Dgg02VmZLDGuBE5TxqU78)." i'm thankful to d for introducing me to [max richter's recording of vivaldi's the four seasons](https://open.spotify.com/album/0JBT8Sw5eGWC86DCrobOfY), especially "[spring 1](https://open.spotify.com/track/4gmhjAsvL6c7se2PBh7dHw)," which feels like flying into the air at higher and higher speeds, through clouds of flower petals, until suddenly everything stops and you're floating there, weightless. i'm thankful for the string arrangement for "[gwan](https://open.spotify.com/track/51HjX1fKoPEebknd2Sas3f)" by rostam (and everything else—i love how he sings so sleepily, like he's just woken up from the dream he is singing about). i'm thankful for "[shark smile](https://open.spotify.com/track/4rCrSoFxqRFmnHQyFGlkbA)" by big thief, which has a lovely acoustic chug and i'm thankful for the chord progression, which reminds me of mazzy star, and i'm thankful for the tape echo on the singer's voice and the effects on the lead guitar, and i'm thankful especially for the small gentle way that the singer sings "_woo_" in the chorus.

i'm thankful for [this story from k](https://twitter.com/AliaM_H/status/862512504274071552) about a dog leading her out of the woods. i'm thankful for [everything frank ocean makes](https://twitter.com/addictf__/status/862086910835032064). i'm thankful for [dwayne johnson](https://www.google.com/search?q=gq+caity+weaver+the+rock&rlz=1C5CHFA_enUS732US733&oq=gq+caity+weaver+the+rock&aqs=chrome..69i57.3992j0j7&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8), bless his soul (i'm thankful, as a distraction from the endless horror show of contemporary politics, to briefly fantasize about someone trying to use his membership in [the nation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nation_of_Domination) against him the way they used bill ayers and jeremiah wright against obama). i'm thankful for [turned backs and raised fists](https://twitter.com/smurfresh/status/862381033068658688). i'm thankful for [the labour party platform](https://twitter.com/emmaggarland/status/862618713899532288) because it lets me imagine a world where that's the platform of a major party in my country. i'm thankful for [this person's gran](https://twitter.com/_kaitlynmcgrory/status/862293148793528321). i'm thankful that [i too could genuinely be an 18yo boy on terrace house](https://twitter.com/hujane/status/862380783054487552).
